name: hd-snippets-js
description: This repo just contains a collection of very helpful JS functions that I use again and again in several projects. There are browser as well as node.js snippets.
author: Hannes Dröse <office.hd@gmx.net> (https://github.com/hd-code/)

scripts.build: npm run clear && tsc && npm run copy && npm run minify && npm run license
scripts.license: for i in build/*; do (echo "/*! $npm_package_name v$npm_package_version | $npm_package_license | Hannes Dröse $npm_package_repository_url */"; cat $i) > __tmp; mv __tmp $i; done;
scripts.minify: for i in build/*.js; do uglifyjs $i -o $i -cm; done;
